name: sublist3r
description: sublist3r is security tool designed to enumerate subdomains of websites using OSINT.

name: subfinder
description: subfinder is a subdomain discovery tool that discovers valid subdomains for websites.

name: assetfinder
description: assetfinder is a tool designed to find domains and subdomains associated with a specific domain.

name: gobuster
description: Gobuster is a tool used to brute-force: URIs (directories and files) in web sites.

name: Amass
description: In-depth DNS enumeration and network mapping.
